headline: ALCATEL ROTARY VANE PUMP 42.4 CFM
description: Alcatel  Two Stage   Rotary Pump            Once sold, all mechanical vacuum pumps will be rebuilt to factory specifications, unless stated otherwise.  All rebuilt pumps are sold with a one year warranty on parts and labor.  Pumps can be ordered Fomblin® or standard hydrocarbon oil prepped.   Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Alcatel
Model 2063C2
Pumping Speed 42.4 CFM (1,198.1 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 3.75E-4(En) torr (5.00E-4 mbar)
Inlet Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Two-Stage YES
Gas Ballast Yes
Ultimate Partial Pressure with Gas Ballast 3.75E-4(En) torr (5.00E-4 mbar)
Direct Drive Yes
Motor Horsepower 3 HP
Rotational Speed 1,740 RPM
Oil Capacity Minimum: 7.00 L (7.40 qt, 1.54 Br gal)
Power Requirements 230 V 9.0 A 60 Hz 3 Phase
Weight 216 lb (98 kg)
